**Smartphone with Integrated Health Monitoring**: The phone would have built-in health monitoring features, such as blood oxygen level tracking, heart rate monitoring, and stress detection using AI-powered algorithms. It would also come with a companion app that provides personalized health recommendations and tracks progress over time. The phone's design would feature a unique, ergonomic shape that fits comfortably in the user's hand, making it easy to use while on-the-go.

**Projector Phone with Virtual Display**: The smartphone would have a built-in projector that can display a virtual screen anywhere, allowing users to project movies, presentations, or games onto any surface. The phone would come with a special app that allows users to customize the display settings, such as resolution, brightness, and color temperature. The projector would be powered by a high-capacity battery, ensuring long-lasting use.

**Waterproof and Dustproof Smartphone with Built-in Camera**: The phone would be designed with a rugged, waterproof, and dustproof body, making it perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and people who work in harsh environments. The phone would come with a high-quality camera that can capture stunning photos and videos, even in low-light conditions. The camera would feature advanced AI-powered features, such as automatic scene detection and object tracking.

**Phone with Integrated 3D Scanner**: The smartphone would have a built-in 3D scanner that can capture detailed 3D models of objects, people, and environments. The phone would come with a companion app that allows users to edit and manipulate the 3D models, creating custom 3D prints or sharing them with others. The 3D scanner would use advanced AI-powered algorithms to detect and track objects, ensuring accurate and precise scans.

**Phone with Built-in Virtual Assistant and Augmented Reality**: The smartphone would feature a built-in virtual assistant that can understand natural language and provide personalized recommendations based on the user's habits and preferences. The phone would also come with an augmented reality (AR) feature that overlays digital information onto the real world, allowing users to interact with virtual objects and environments. The AR feature would be powered by a high-performance processor and advanced AI algorithms, ensuring seamless and immersive experiences.
